MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

RoboSoft.Company_Description: KARPOLAN is a nickname of Anton Karpenko
RoboSoft.Comments_For_Reviewer: Thank you for your interest. Hope this program helps you too :)

NewsFeed.NewsFeed_DESCRIPTION: This PAD extension allows you to add your RSS and Atom news feeds info into your PAD file. This info can be used by RSS feed submission software or by feed directories themselves.
NewsFeed.NewsFeed_Description_70: Keyboard Leds software lets you know the current state of keyboard loc
NewsFeed.NewsFeed_Description_250: Keyboard Leds software lets you know the current state of keyboard locks

Site.Site_DESCRIPTION: This PAD extension allows you to add your site info into your PAD file. This info can be used by site submission software or by web directories themselves.
Site.Site_Description_100: Keyboard Leds software lets you know the current state of keyboard locks
Site.Site_Description_250: Keyboard Leds software lets you know the current state of keyboard locks. You can see the status either on a small icon in the system tray or on a floating OSD window.
Site.Site_Description_450: Lots of notebooks, netbooks and cordless keyboards have no indicators for Caps Lock, and Num Lock. Scroll Lock's bulb disappeared almost from any hardware for now. Keyboard Leds software solves this problem. The program lets you know the current state of keyboard locks. You can see the status either on a small icon in the system tray or on a floating OSD window.
Site.Site_Keywords: caps lock, num lock, scroll lock, keyboard lock, keyboard indicator, keyboard led, lock indicator. shift lock

Program_Info.Program_Change_Info: Added option to disable Internet features (updates, PingNotify statistics, etc.) Memory consumption improved.

Permissions.Distribution_Permissions: This Software may be distributed freely through on-line services, bulletin boards, or other forms of electronic media, as long as the files are distributed in their entirety. Computer Magazines/Archives are authorized to distribute Software on any Cover Disk or CD-ROM without an individual permission.
Permissions.EULA:
This is the End User License Agreement (the "Agreement") is a legal agreement between you, the end-user ("Licensee"), and KARPOLAN, the manufacturer and the copyright owner ("Owner"), for the use of the "Keyboard Leds" aka "Keyboard Indicators" aka "Key Leds" software product ("Software").
By using this Software or storing this program on a computer drive (or other media), you are agreeing to be bound by the terms of this Agreement. If you do not agree with the terms of this Agreement, please remove this Software from your system.
Rights ======
The Software is protected by copyright laws and international copyright treaties, as well as other intellectual property laws and treaties. Software is licensed, not sold. Software is free to use and includes no technical support. The origin of this Software must not be misrepresented.
Copyright =========
All title, including but not limited to copyrights, in and to the Software and any copies thereof are owned by Owner or its suppliers. All title and intellectual property rights in and to the content which may be accessed through use of the Software is the property of the respective content owner and may be protected by applicable copyright or other intellectual property laws and treaties. This Agreement grants you no rights to use such content. All rights not expressly granted are reserved by Owner.
Distribution ============
This Software may be distributed freely through on-line services, bulletin boards, or other forms of electronic media, as long as the files are distributed in their entirety. Computer Magazines/Archives are authorized to distribute Software on any Cover Disk or CD-ROM without an individual permission.
Restrictions ============
You may not alter this Software in any way, including changing or removing any messages or windows. You may not decompile, reverse engineer, disassemble or otherwise reduce this Software to a human perceivable form. You may not modify, rent or resell this Software for profit, or create any derivative works, based upon this Software.
Disclaimer ==========
This Software is provided on an "as is" basis without warranty of any kind, expressed or implied, including but not limited to the implied warranties of merchantability and suitability for a particular purpose. The person using the Software bears all risk as to the quality and performance of the Software. Owner will not be liable for any special, incidental, consequential, indirect or similar damages due to loss of data or any other reason, even if Owner or an agent of Owner has been advised of the possibility of such damages. In no event will Owner be liable for costs of any damages. You acknowledge that you have read this license, understood it, and agreed to be bound by its terms.

English.Keywords: caps lock, num lock, scroll lock, keyboard lock, keyboard indicator, keyboard led, lock indicator. shift lock
English.Char_Desc_45: Lets you know the state of keyboard locks
English.Char_Desc_80: Keyboard Leds software lets you know the current state of keyboard locks
English.Char_Desc_250: Keyboard Leds software lets you know the current state of keyboard locks. You can see the status either on a small icon in the system tray or on a floating OSD window.
English.Char_Desc_450: Lots of notebooks, netbooks and cordless keyboards have no indicators for Caps Lock, and Num Lock. Scroll Lock's bulb disappeared almost from any hardware for now. Keyboard Leds software solves this problem. The program lets you know the current state of keyboard locks. You can see the status either on a small icon in the system tray or on a floating OSD window.
English.Char_Desc_2000: Lots of notebooks, netbooks and cordless keyboards have no indicators for Caps Lock, and Num Lock. Scroll Lock's bulb disappeared almost from any hardware for now. Keyboard Leds software solves this problem. The program lets you know the current state of keyboard locks. You can see the status either on a small icon in the system tray or on a floating OSD window.

Russian.Char_Desc_2000: На многих современных ноутбуках, нетбуках и беспроводных клавиатурах отсутствуют светодиодные индикаторы Caps Lock и Num Lock. А о лампочке Scroll Lock производители забыли уже давно. Программа Keyboard Leds решает эту проблему, с помощью ее Вы можете узнать текущее состояние переключателей клавиатуры. Положение "замков" отображается на иконке в системном лотке, а так же в плавающем окне на экране.
Russian.Char_Desc_450: На многих современных ноутбуках, нетбуках и беспроводных клавиатурах отсутствуют светодиодные индикаторы Caps Lock и Num Lock. А о лампочке Scroll Lock производители забыли уже давно. Программа Keyboard Leds решает эту проблему, с помощью ее Вы можете узнать текущее состояние переключателей клавиатуры. Положение "замков" отображается на иконке в системном лотке, а так же в плавающем окне на экране.
Russian.Char_Desc_250: Keyboard Leds позволяет узнать текущее состояние переключателей клавиатуры. Состояние светодиодов отображается на иконке в системном лотке а так же в плавающем окне на экране.
Russian.Char_Desc_80: Keyboard Leds позволяет узнать текущее состояние переключателей клавиатуры
Russian.Keywords: клавиатура, keyboard, caps lock, num lock, scroll lock

German.Char_Desc_2000: Viele Notebooks, Netbooks und schnurlose Tastaturen haben keine Indikatoren für Caps Lock, Num Lock und. Scroll Lock's Birne verschwand fast von jeder Hardware für jetzt. Keyboard Leds Software löst dieses Problem. Das Programm lässt Sie wissen, den aktuellen Stand der Tastatur sperrt. Sie können den Status entweder auf ein kleines Symbol in der Taskleiste oder auf einer schwimmenden OSD-Fenster zu sehen.
German.Char_Desc_450: Viele Notebooks, Netbooks und schnurlose Tastaturen haben keine Indikatoren für Caps Lock, Num Lock und. Scroll Lock's Birne verschwand fast von jeder Hardware für jetzt. Keyboard Leds Software löst dieses Problem. Das Programm lässt Sie wissen, den aktuellen Stand der Tastatur sperrt. Sie können den Status entweder auf ein kleines Symbol in der Taskleiste oder auf einer schwimmenden OSD-Fenster zu sehen.
German.Char_Desc_250: Keyboard Leds Software können Sie den aktuellen Stand der Tastatur sperrt. Sie können den Status entweder auf ein kleines Symbol in der Taskleiste oder auf einer schwimmenden OSD-Fenster zu sehen.
German.Char_Desc_80: Software können Sie den aktuellen Stand der Tastatur sperrt
German.Char_Desc_45: Sie den aktuellen Stand der Tastatur sperrt
German.Keywords: tastatur, keyboard, caps lock, num lock, scroll lock

French.Keywords: clavier, keyboard, caps lock, num lock, scroll lock
French.Char_Desc_80: Logiciel vous permet de connaître l'état actuel des écluses du clavier
French.Char_Desc_250: Keyboard Leds logiciel vous permet de connaître l'état actuel des écluses du clavier. Vous pouvez voir l'état soit sur une petite icône dans la barre système ou sur une fenêtre flottante OSD.
French.Char_Desc_450: Beaucoup de portables, netbooks et des claviers sans fil ont pas d'indicateurs pour les Caps Lock, Num Lock et. ampoule Scroll Lock a disparu presque de tout le matériel pour le moment. Keyboard Leds logiciel résout ce problème. Le programme vous permet de connaître l'état actuel des écluses du clavier. Vous pouvez voir l'état soit sur une petite icône dans la barre système ou sur une fenêtre flottante OSD.
French.Char_Desc_2000: Beaucoup de portables, netbooks et des claviers sans fil ont pas d'indicateurs pour les Caps Lock, Num Lock et. ampoule Scroll Lock a disparu presque de tout le matériel pour le moment. Keyboard Leds logiciel résout ce problème. Le programme vous permet de connaître l'état actuel des écluses du clavier. Vous pouvez voir l'état soit sur une petite icône dans la barre système ou sur une fenêtre flottante OSD.

Spanish.Char_Desc_2000: Muchos de los portátiles, netbooks y teclados inalámbricos no tienen indicadores de bloqueo de mayúsculas, bloqueo numérico y. bulbo Scroll Lock desapareció casi desde cualquier hardware por ahora. Keyboard Leds de software resuelve este problema. El programa le permite conocer el estado actual de bloqueos de teclado. Usted puede ver el estado ya sea en un pequeño icono en la bandeja del sistema o en una ventana flotante OSD.
Spanish.Char_Desc_450: Muchos de los portátiles, netbooks y teclados inalámbricos no tienen indicadores de bloqueo de mayúsculas, bloqueo numérico y. bulbo Scroll Lock desapareció casi desde cualquier hardware por ahora. Keyboard Leds de software resuelve este problema. El programa le permite conocer el estado actual de bloqueos de teclado. Usted puede ver el estado ya sea en un pequeño icono en la bandeja del sistema o en una ventana flotante OSD.

Spanish.Char_Desc_45: El estado actual de bloqueos de teclado
Spanish.Char_Desc_80: Keyboard Leds le permite conocer el estado actual de bloqueos de teclado
Spanish.Keywords: teclado, keyboard, caps lock, num lock, scroll lock

Italian.Char_Desc_2000: Lots di notebook, netbook e tastiere senza fili non hanno indicatori di Caps Lock e Bloc Num. Bulbo Scroll Lock è scomparso quasi da qualsiasi hardware, per ora. I led della tastiera software risolve questo problema. Il programma ti permette di conoscere lo stato attuale delle serrature tastiera. È possibile visualizzare lo stato o su una piccola icona nella system tray o su una finestra OSD mobile.
Italian.Char_Desc_450: Lots di notebook, netbook e tastiere senza fili non hanno indicatori di Caps Lock e Bloc Num. Bulbo Scroll Lock è scomparso quasi da qualsiasi hardware, per ora. I led della tastiera software risolve questo problema. Il programma ti permette di conoscere lo stato attuale delle serrature tastiera. È possibile visualizzare lo stato o su una piccola icona nella system tray o su una finestra OSD mobile.
Italian.Char_Desc_250: Keyboard Leds software ti permette di conoscere lo stato attuale delle serrature tastiera. È possibile visualizzare lo stato o su una piccola icona nella system tray o su una finestra OSD mobile.
Italian.Char_Desc_80: Software ti permette di conoscere lo stato attuale delle serrature tastiera
Italian.Char_Desc_45: Consente di conoscere lo stato della tastiera
Italian.Keywords: Caps Lock, Bloc Num, Scroll Lock, blocco tastiera, Indicatore della tastiera, tastiera led, indicatore di blocco. shift lock

Portuguese.Char_Desc_2000: Os lotes de notebooks, netbooks e teclados sem fio não tem indicadores para CapsLock e Num Lock. Bulbo Scroll Lock desapareceu quase de qualquer hardware por enquanto. Keyboard Leds software resolve esse problema. O programa permite quevocê saiba o estado atual da trava o teclado. Você pode ver o status, quer por umpequeno ícone na bandeja do sistema ou em uma janela OSD flutuante.
